Package org.robolectric.shadows

Class WifiScanResultBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.robolectric.shadows.WifiScanResultBuilder
public final class WifiScanResultBuilder extends Object
Builder class for ScanResult allowing for more accurate construction of Wi-Fi scan results in test code.

    • setFrequency

      @CanIgnoreReturnValue public WifiScanResultBuilder setFrequency(int frequency)
      Sets the value of the frequency, in MHz, returned by the ScanResult.frequency field.
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • setSsid

      @CanIgnoreReturnValue public WifiScanResultBuilder setSsid(@Nullable String ssid)
      Sets the value of the ScanResult.SSID field. On API 33 and above, this also sets the return value of ScanResult.getWifiSsid().
      Parameters:
      ssid - the name of the network, or null; this should be either a UTF-8 encoded string, surrounded by quotes (e.g. '"Network name"'), or an unquoted hex-encoded string (e.g. '0a8b2c1f').
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • setTimeSinceSeen

      @CanIgnoreReturnValue public WifiScanResultBuilder setTimeSinceSeen(Duration timeSinceSeen)
      Sets the duration since boot since the result was seen.
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining
      See Also:
      • ScanResult.timestamp

    • setWifiSsid

      @RequiresApi(33) @CanIgnoreReturnValue public WifiScanResultBuilder setWifiSsid(@Nullable WifiSsid wifiSsid)
      Sets the value returned by ScanResult.getWifiSsid(), additionally setting the deprecated ScanResult.SSID field.
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • setChannelWidth

      @RequiresApi(23) @CanIgnoreReturnValue public WifiScanResultBuilder setChannelWidth(int channelWidth)
      Sets the value returned by ScanResult.channelWidth. This should be one of the constants in ScanResult such as ScanResult.CHANNEL_WIDTH_20MHZ.
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

    • setCenterFreq0

      @RequiresApi(23) @CanIgnoreReturnValue public WifiScanResultBuilder setCenterFreq0(int centerFreq0)
      Sets the center frequency, in MHz, of the first segment (see ScanResult.centerFreq0).
      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining

      @CanIgnoreReturnValue @RequiresApi(23) public WifiScanResultBuilder setCenterFreq1(int centerFreq1)

      Returns:
      this builder, for chaining
